message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $8250. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're trying to save as much as you can, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $8000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
